kit.leader_skill: "GT Bosses" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +130%

super_attack.name: Dark Destructive Blast
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: Discharge of Evil
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to Rainbow Ki Spheres; (Forever) ATK & DEF 100% up; When attacking with 2 or more Ki Spheres obtained: ATK & DEF 50% up; When attacking with 3 or more Ki Spheres obtained: ATK & DEF 50% up; When attacking with 4 or more Ki Spheres obtained: ATK & DEF 50% up; When attacking with 5 or more Ki Spheres obtained: Disables the enemy's guard; When attacking with 6 or more Ki Spheres obtained: High chance of performing a critical hit; When attacking with 7 or more Ki Spheres obtained: ATK & DEF 70% up; High chance of launching an additional Super Attack

passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (TEQ excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres; (Forever) Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 150% up; (Forever) High chance of performing a critical hit; (Forever) High chance of launching an additional Super Attack; For 1 turn from the character's entry turn: Damage reduction rate 40% up; When attacking: Disables the enemy's guard; ATK & DEF 50% up per Ki Sphere obtained (up to 350%); 2 or more Ki Spheres obtained: Damage reduction rate 20% up; 3 or more Ki Spheres obtained: Chance of performing a critical hit 20% up; 4 or more Ki Spheres obtained: Damage reduction rate 20% up; 5 or more Ki Spheres obtained: Chance of performing a critical hit 30% up; 6 or more Ki Spheres obtained: Launches an additional Super Attack; 7 or more Ki Spheres obtained: Attacked enemy's ATK & DEF 20% for 2 turns
